rules_text:
Trample
Vestis's power and toughness are equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.
When Vestis enters, mill three cards.
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]An entity older than time drove the Phyrexians back through the branches of Realmbreaker.[/i]
